structure.unit: DIVISION 6. PROTECTION OF EMPLOYEES DISCLOSING SPECIFIED INFORMATION

text.section:
Sec. 2-56.28.21. Retroactive application.
Notwithstanding the requirements of employees who have filed complaints of whistle-blowing in state or federal court as of the date this ordinance is enacted shall have the right to file a complaint and receive a hearing in accordance with the terms of this division.
